name: Burning Out (itch) (BasiliCool)
description:
Every second you are fading more and more.

Standing still is the only way to stop the timer.

You don't know why, you don't remember who you are or how you ended up in here.

But you don't want to just sit and wait. Right?

The timer is still there: 60 seconds left.

Explore this place, collect 3 keys, and exit without fading away completely.

(There are 3 endings - Submit you best score!)

Game made for the "1 Minute Game Jam".

This game was made in less than 24hrs.

Art, asset: 4 hrs // Coding:  4 hrs // Concept: 1hrs // Bugs and other things: 3 hrs // Playing League with GM open: 12 hrs // Music: 10 mins with Strofe.com

Check out my other game here!
